message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique and valuable product. I believe it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to start the negotiation at a price of $2000000.
I'm interested in the product, but $2000000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $1500000 for it.
I understand that $1500000 is a bit lower than my initial offer, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1800000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $1600000 for the product.
I can see that you're really interested in the product, and I'm willing to make a bit of a compromise. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1700000.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $1650000 for the product.
I can see that you're getting close to your budget, and I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1750000.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $1700000 for the product, but that's as high as I can go.

I understand that you're really close to your budget, and I'm willing to make one final concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1725000, but I need to know that you're serious about making a deal.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm really close to my budget. I'm willing to pay $1700000 for the product, and that's my final offer.
